title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.6 - Producer
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1 ยง 40.6 - Producer

State Regulations

Producer means any person in the State of New York who is
engaged in the production of milk in a quantity which exceeds family and
on-farm use or who causes milk to be produced for any market in this or any
other state. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 1
ยง
40.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
